Room.Name: Arena Challenge
Room.ShortDescription: This part of the arena truly challenges your wits and skill.
Room.LongDescription: The action is a little faster and the fighters a little meaner. A great many of your predecessors have died here, entertaining the masses who come to see the blood spurt, and the eyes bulge. You do want to entertain them, don't you? Loud cheering erupts as you step into the center of the arena. they're cheering for you!
